alert.note: Alert for Grand Canyon Country; Marble and Glen Canyons (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 29 at 1:23AM MST until October 30 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM MST /3 AM MDT/ TO 9 AM MST /10 AM MDT/ MONDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 25 degrees expected. * WHERE...Portions of Coconino County including the lower elevations of the Grand Canyon, Marble Canyon, and Glen Canyon. This includes Page, Lees Ferry, Phantom Ranch, and Supai. * WHEN...From 2 AM MST /3 AM MDT/ to 9 AM MST /10 AM MDT/ Monday. * IMPACTS...Freezing conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Grand Canyon Country; Marble and Glen Canyons
